name: Hogg Wild
description:
Go Wild, Hogg Wild!
Hogg Wild is ready to play. Download today!
Love farming games? Want to go wild with farm animals? Hogg Wild has all new fun features and bonus points.

5 MORE REASONS TO GO WILD!
~~~~~~~~~~
- SIMPLE & FUN – Fun features and a ton of bonus points!
- UNIQUE PLAY – Match three or more of a farm animal to save them!
- PLAY WITH FRIENDS – Sign in to Facebook to see your friends on the map!
- GET STARS – Complete tasks to get stars, items and save the animals!
- PLAY ANYWHERE! – This best farm game is available with or without internet!

Hogg Wild is fun for the whole family! Download today to help Farmer Brown save the animals and collect bonus points!

Privacy Policy: http://www.snaptgames.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Service: http://www.snaptgames.com/terms-of-service/
